description:
The Zod is Navas Lab’s solution to shorts for tall guys. The Zod is made from 100% polyester and made with extra length for taller legs. These shorts feel amazing and fit tall guys of any height with grace.

Navas Lab is the leader in functional tall guys clothes and the Zod is a practical and stylish pair of shorts you can wear to the pool, beach or the gym.

At Navas, they are tall guys too so they know that tall slim guys still struggle to find shorts that fit properly and look good. If you’re tired of XXXL and Big&Tall shorts that don’t look or feel good, you may have just found the answer to your problems.

Their Zod boardshorts are simple, practical and look awesome. At Navas Lab they focus on comfort and functionality for tall guys in every piece of clothing they make.
name: Navas Lab Apparel Zod - Tall Boardshorts - Mens
